summary.span: 定义数据库连接的核心行为，并为数据库专用连接提供基类。

span.span: Defines the core behavior of database connections and provides a base class for database-specific connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回`Task`已完成的，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `Task`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认的 inmplementation。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default inmplementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

summary.span: 开始数据库事务。

span.span: Starts a database transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定隔离级别，则使用特定连接类型的默认隔离级别。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level for the specific type of connection is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，关闭与数据库之间的连接。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, closes the connection to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法回滚所有挂起的事务。The and methods roll back any pending transactions. 然后，它们会发布到连接池的连接，或者在禁用连接池的情况下关闭连接。They then release the connection to the connection pool, or close the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 应用程序可以调用一次或多次。An application can call or more than one time. 不生成异常。No exception is generated. 如果超出范围，则它不会关闭。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，你必须通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`，来显式关闭连接，这在功能上是等效的。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`, which are functionally equivalent. 如果 "连接池" `Pooling`值设置为`true`或`yes`，则这也会释放物理连接。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, this also releases the physical connection. > [!CAUTION] > 不要在类的`DbConnection` `Finalize`方法中关闭或`DbDataReader`disipose、或任何其他托管对象。Do not close or disipose a `DbConnection`, a `DbDataReader`, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，只应释放类直接拥有的非托管资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

span.span: Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 异步关闭与数据库之间的连接。

span.span: Asynchronously closes the connection to the database.
A representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回`Task`已完成的，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `Task`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认的 inmplementation。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default inmplementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 和方法回滚所有挂起的事务。The and methods roll back any pending transactions. 然后，它们会发布到连接池的连接，或者在禁用连接池的情况下关闭连接。They then release the connection to the connection pool, or close the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 应用程序可以调用一次或多次。An application can call or more than one time. 不生成异常。No exception is generated. 如果超出范围，则它不会关闭。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，你必须通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`，来显式关闭连接，这在功能上是等效的。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`, which are functionally equivalent. 如果 "连接池" `Pooling`值设置为`true`或`yes`，则这也会释放物理连接。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, this also releases the physical connection. > [!CAUTION] > 不要在类的`DbConnection` `Finalize`方法中关闭或`DbDataReader`释放、或任何其他托管对象。Do not close or dispose a `DbConnection`, a `DbDataReader`, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，只应释放类直接拥有的非托管资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取或设置用于打开连接的字符串。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the string used to open the connection.

value.span: 用来建立初始连接的连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string used to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。

span.span: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection. 若要确定哪些设置有效，请参阅您正在使用的特定连接类型的文档。To determine which settings are valid, see the documentation for the specific type of connection that you are using.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Database As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Database { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，在连接打开之后获取当前数据库的名称，或者在连接打开之前获取连接字符串中指定的数据库名。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the current database after a connection is opened, or the database name specified in the connection string before the connection is opened.

value.span: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

span.span: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当当前数据库更改时，连接通常会动态更新此属性。A connection typically updates this property dynamically when the current database changes.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DataSource As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

span.span: The name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果与数据库的连接已关闭，则将返回`DataSource`关键字中包含的任何内容。If the connection to the database is closed, the returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword. 如果连接已打开，并且数据源关键字的值以 "|`datadirectory`|" 开头 ，则`DataSource`属性将返回中包含的所有内容（仅适用于关键字）。If the connection is open and the data source keyword's value starts with "|`datadirectory`|", the property returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword only. 如果与数据库的连接已打开，则属性返回本机提供程序为`DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`返回的内容，如果为空，则返回本机提供程序的。 `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME`If the connection to the database is open, the property returns what the native provider returns for the `DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`, and if that is empty, the native provider's `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME` is returned.

span.span: Connection Strings (ADO.NET)
ADO.NET Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回`ValueTask`已完成的，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `ValueTask`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认的 inmplementation。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default inmplementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed
abstract member EnlistTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction -> unit override this.EnlistTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction -> unit

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定事务中登记。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ADO.NET 2.0 中的新增项支持使用`EnlistTransaction`方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the `EnlistTransaction` method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 由于它在实例中登记连接， `EnlistTransaction`因此利用了命名空间中的可用功能来管理分布式事务。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, `EnlistTransaction` takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions. 在事务中显式登记某个连接后，在第一个事务完成之前，该连接将无法取消登记或登记到另一个事务中。Once a connection is explicitly enlisted in a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes.

span.span: Transactions and Concurrency (ADO.NET)
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: virtual System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);
abstract member GetSchema : string * string[] -> System.Data.DataTable override this.GetSchema : string * string[] -> System.Data.DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 为请求的架构指定一组限制值。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 通过使用指定字符串作为架构名称，指定字符串数组作为限制值，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数可以提供 n 个值深度，这些值由特定集合的限制集合指定。 `restrictionValues`The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要设置给定限制的值，而不设置其他限制的值，则需要将前面的限制设置为 null，然后将相应的值放在中，以确定要为其指定值的限制。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. "Tables" 集合就是这样的一个示例。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果 "Tables" 集合具有三个限制（数据库、所有者和表名称），并且您只想返回与 "Carl" 所有者关联的表，则必须至少传递以下值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name) and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you must pass in the following values at least: null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，则将默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这与传入 null 的映射相同，后者不同于传入参数值的空字符串。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串（""）被视为指定参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

span.span: is specified as null.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，打开其设置由 指定的数据库连接。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法必须由用户定义的行为重写。This method must be overridden with user-defined behavior. 如果再次调用而不先关闭，将引发异常。 will throw an exception if called again without first being closed.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

exception.span: 打开集合时发生的错误。

span.span: An error occurred while opening the connection.

summary.span: 此方法实现 的异步版本。

span.span: This method implements an asynchronous version of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 SQL Server 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task OpenAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 的异步版本，打开由 指定的设置的数据库连接。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

summary.span: 此方法通过 CancellationToken.None 调用虚拟方法 。

span.span: This method invokes the virtual method with CancellationToken.None.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用后， 必须返回直到返回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然后，如果连接成功， 则必须返回。 Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果连接失败， 则必须返回。 If the connection fails, must return . 对的调用将尝试取消或关闭相应的调用。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 有关 SQL Server 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

span.span: This is the asynchronous version of .

span.span: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.

summary.span: 可选择性接受取消标记。

span.span: The cancellation token can optionally be honored.

summary.span: 默认实现调用同步 调用并返回已完成任务。

span.span: The default implementation invokes the synchronous call and returns a completed task.

summary.span: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的 cancellationToken。

span.span: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.

summary.span: Open 引发的异常将通过返回的任务异常属性传递。

span.span: Exceptions thrown by Open will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.

summary.span: 在返回的任务完成前，不要调用 对象的其他方法和属性。

span.span: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用后， 必须返回直到返回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然后，如果连接成功， 则必须返回。 Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果连接失败， 则必须返回。 If the connection fails, must return . 对的调用将尝试取消或关闭相应的调用。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 有关 SQL Server 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
